short_summary: Portable Printing Products for Canada Revenue Agency
description: Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) has a requirement for Portable Printing Products over a three (3) initial period with two (2) one (1) year options to extend the contract. This Contract is for the supply and delivery of the equipment. Hardware is to be provided under the Contract on an as-and-when-requested basis and will be ordered by Canada using a Task Authorization (TA).
duration_in_months: It covers a period of three (3) years
full_summary:
**Notification of Invitation to Tender**
### Portable Printing Products for Canada Revenue Agency

**Contract Information**

* **Contract Title**: Portable Printing Products for Canada Revenue Agency
* **Contract Reference Number**: SSC-22-00020330
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM017071/20330
* **Publication Date**: September 30, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 7, 2022, 14:00 EST
* **Contract Status**: Expiré (Expired)

**Procurement Details**

* **Notice Type**: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
* **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
* **Trade Agreements**: *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* *Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* *Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* *Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* *Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contract Requirements**

* The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) requires the supply and delivery of portable printing products.
* The contract is for an initial period of three years with two one-year options to extend.
* The equipment must meet the mandatory technical specifications detailed in Annex A of the Contract.
* Hardware will be ordered by Canada using a Task Authorization (TA).
* The procurement is set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

**Contact Information**

* For more information, please contact Katherine Ikeson at:
	+ Email: katherine.ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 613-298-2147
	+ Fax: 613-123-4567
	+ Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, ON K2P 2H8, Canada
* Please note that the attachments listed in the tender details are available for download from the Shared Services Canada website. 

**Please note:** The tender is now expired and closed. No further submissions will be accepted.  The links in
